title: Condition for test of slope for roller coasters

content.question: Based on the residual plot, which condition appears to have been violated?

choices.label: The sum of the residuals is <math alttext="0" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>0</mn></mrow></mstyle></math>.
The expected value of the errors is <math alttext="0" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>0</mn></mrow></mstyle></math>.
There is a linear relationship between the response variable and the explanatory variable.
The variance of the response variable is constant for all values of the explanatory variable.

content.answer: The variance of the response variable is constant for all values of the explanatory variable.

topic.text: 9.4: Setting Up a Test for the Slope of a Regression Model

skill.text: Skill 4.C: Verify that inference procedures apply in a given situation.
